title: KfW increases its "refugee accommodation" extraordinary promotion to EUR 1 billion in total (KfW Bankengruppe) ...
text: ( Source : KfW Bankengruppe) A further EUR 500 million has been pledged to finance accommodation for refugees Interest-free loans with terms of up to 30 years and fixed interest rates for 10 years Accommodation to be created for up to a total
